sentences.en: Accustomed to flattering , flattery died upon his lips when he addressed Lone.
sentences.cn: 他是惯于阿谀奉承的, 可是一跟伊俄涅说话,却一句奉承的话都说不出来了.

sentences.en: Accustomed to helping her with her tads, he complied.
sentences.cn: 平日帮她办惯了事, 他只好服从.

sentences.en: Accustomed to the controls, Burcham came down from high altitude.
sentences.cn: 在适应了操纵装置后, 伯彻姆便从高空俯冲而下.

sentences.en: Camels being accustomed to heavy loads walk slowly.
sentences.cn: 骆驼——在口内负重惯了的——是走不快的.

sentences.en: Freed acted with his accustomed shrewdness.
sentences.cn: 弗里德以他一贯的精明风范行动起来。

sentences.en: He has become accustomed to his new duties.
sentences.cn: 他已经适应了新的职务.

sentences.en: He lost his accustomed vigor and languished in the troplcal climate.
sentences.cn: 他失去了他惯有的活力,在热带气候中变得无精打采?

sentences.en: He said that he was accustomed to making command decisions.
sentences.cn: 他说他善于作重要的决定.

sentences.en: He took his accustomed seat by the fire.
sentences.cn: 他坐在火炉旁他常坐的座位上.

sentences.en: He took up his accustomed position with his back to the fire.
sentences.cn: 他背对着炉火在通常的位子上坐了下来。

sentences.en: His eyes became accustomed to the dark after the brilliance of the sun outside.
sentences.cn: 从阳光耀眼的室外走进来后，他的双眼开始适应了黑暗。

sentences.en: My eyes were becoming accustomed to the gloom.
sentences.cn: 我的眼睛渐渐适应了黑暗。

sentences.en: No one wishes to deal with a person who is accustomed to breaking his word.
sentences.cn: 谁也不愿意与惯于食言的人打交道.

sentences.en: The pans were in their accustomed places.
The team has accustomed itself to the pace of first division rugby.
sentences.cn: 球队适应了英式橄榄球甲级联赛的节奏。

sentences.en: They are accustomed to this sort of work.
We were accustomed to working together.

phrases.tran_cn: 习惯于；对…变得习以为常

trans.tran_cn: 习惯的，适应的，通常的，惯常的
使习惯（于），使适应（accustom的过去式）
